groups.name: axon.sentry.tracing
groups.description: Configuration properties for Axon-Sentry tracing integration.

properties.name: axon.sentry.tracing.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable tracing entirely. When disabled, no tracing interceptors are registered.

properties.name: axon.sentry.tracing.trace-commands
properties.description: Enable command tracing. Creates spans for command dispatch and handling.

properties.name: axon.sentry.tracing.trace-events
properties.description: Enable event tracing. Creates spans for event publication and handling.

properties.name: axon.sentry.tracing.trace-queries
properties.description: Enable query tracing. Creates spans for query dispatch and handling.

properties.name: axon.sentry.tracing.trace-event-processors
properties.description: Enable event processor tracing. Enriches event spans with processor information.

properties.name: axon.sentry.tracing.trace-sagas
properties.description: Enable saga tracing. Creates spans for saga invocations.

properties.name: axon.sentry.tracing.capture-command-payloads
properties.description: Capture command payloads in spans. WARNING: Be cautious with sensitive data. Payloads may contain personally identifiable information (PII) or secrets.

properties.name: axon.sentry.tracing.capture-event-payloads
properties.description: Capture event payloads in spans. Consider data sensitivity before enabling.

properties.name: axon.sentry.tracing.capture-query-payloads
properties.description: Capture query payloads in spans. Consider data sensitivity before enabling.

properties.name: axon.sentry.tracing.sentry-dsn
properties.description: Sentry Data Source Name (DSN). Can also be configured via SENTRY_DSN environment variable. Required when tracing is enabled.

properties.name: axon.sentry.tracing.environment
properties.description: Deployment environment (e.g., development, staging, production). Used to categorize traces in Sentry.

properties.name: axon.sentry.tracing.traces-sample-rate
properties.description: Sample rate for traces (0.0 to 1.0). 1.0 = trace 100% of requests, 0.1 = trace 10% of requests, 0.0 = disable all tracing.

properties.name: axon.sentry.tracing.attach-stacktrace
properties.description: Attach stack traces to Sentry events. Provides additional context for errors.

properties.name: axon.sentry.tracing.release
properties.description: Release version to report to Sentry. Helps track which version of your application produced traces.

properties.name: axon.sentry.tracing.tags
properties.description: Additional tags to add to all spans. Useful for categorizing traces by team, service, etc.
